2,147 meters (approx. 68 minutes)CountrySoviet UnionLanguageRussian

Simple People (Russian: Простые люди) is a 1945 Soviet war movie directed by Grigori Kozintsev and Leonid Trauberg.[1][2] It stars Yuri Tolubeyev, Olga Lebzak, and Boris Zhukovsky.

Yuri Tolubeyev - Yeryemin

Olga Lebzak - Yeryemina

Boris Zhukovsky - Makeev

F. Babadzhanov - Akbashev

Yekaterina Korchagina-Aleksandrovskaya - grandmother

I. Kudryavtseva - Varvara
